title: Portrait of Sidney Janis with Mondrian Painting
medium: Plaster figure with Mondrian's "Composition," 1933, on an easel
dimensions: figure 66" (167.6 cm) high; easel 67" (170 cm) high; overall, 69 7/8 x 56 1/4 x 27 1/4" (177.3 x  142.8 x 69.1 cm)
